title: Winter Fun
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 32 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: In Winter Fun, kids are all dressed up in winter clothing. They are having fun playing in the winter weather. Patterned text, the high-frequency word, are, and supportive pictures make this book perfect for emerging readers.
reviewWords: coats, mittens, pants, scarves, sleds, winter
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : Write words in alphabetical order
